title: Caught Offside: Stay Healthy
description:
On this week's pod, the boys discuss Barcelona's spending spree as Robert Lewandowski joins up with the club. Plus, Berhalter addresses John Brooks, Zinchenko joins Arsenal and JJ debuts his new segment, "I saw it on the internet."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Lewandowski to Barca, Berhalter speaks, England advance
